title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta, mix with eggs and cheese, and combine with cooked bacon.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
instructions: Cook rice and stir-fry with chicken, vegetables, and soy sauce.

title: Creamy Mushroom Chicken
instructions: Saute chicken and mushrooms, add cream, and simmer.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef with mushrooms, stir in sour cream, serve over pasta.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in soy sauce and garlic.

title: Grilled Salmon
instructions: Grill salmon with lemon, garlic, and herbs.

title: Tuna Pasta Salad
instructions: Mix cooked pasta with tuna, mayo, and veggies.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef with beans and tomatoes. Add chili.

title: Lentil Soup
instructions: Boil lentils with vegetables and spices.

title: Baked Ziti
instructions: Layer pasta with meat sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

title: Shepherd's Pie
instructions: Layer cooked beef and vegetables under mashed potatoes. Bake.

title: Stuffed Peppers
instructions: Stuff peppers with meat and rice mixture. Bake.

title: Mac and Cheese
instructions: Make cheese sauce, mix with pasta, and bake.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Saute shrimp in garlic butter, serve over pasta.

title: Fajitas
instructions: Cook chicken with peppers and spices. Serve in tortillas.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with spices. Fill taco shells with beef and toppings.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook pasta and mix with Alfredo sauce and chicken.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Boil vegetables and beans. Add pasta and cook until tender.

title: Bulgur Salad
instructions: Mix cooked bulgur with chopped vegetables and lemon juice.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta and toss with sauteed vegetables.

title: Sloppy Joes
instructions: Cook beef with sauce and serve on buns.

title: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Blend chickpeas with spices, form patties, fry, and wrap.

title: Sweet and Sour Chicken
instructions: Cook chicken with sauce ingredients and veggies.

title: Gnocchi with Pesto
instructions: Boil gnocchi and mix with pesto sauce.

title: Pork Chops with Apples
instructions: Cook pork with apples and onion until tender.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Layer fried eggplant with sauce and cheese, then bake.

title: Quiche Lorraine
instructions: Fill crust with egg mixture and bake.

title: Turkey Meatballs
instructions: Form and bake meatballs, then simmer in sauce.

title: Ratatouille
instructions: Layer and roast vegetables with herbs.

title: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Fry tofu and mix with stir-fried vegetables and sauce.

title: Curry Chickpeas
instructions: Simmer chickpeas in coconut curry sauce.
